name: Bratz®: Fashion Boutique
description:
Bratz® are everyone's favorite girls with a passion for fashion®! Now you can join the girls and run the hottest fashion boutiques in Stylesville. Help create the latest trends and tap into your inner diva!

• Play as your favorite Bratz; Cloe™, Yasmin™, Sasha™ and Jade™ and run their own fashion boutiques!
• Create your own trendy, custom outfits in the Workshop Mini-games and sell them to earn more money!
• Be the newest “It” thing in Stylesville with the latest trends!
• Put on the hottest Fashion Shows and raise your fame to attract more customers, maybe even some celebrity Bratz!
• Unlock exclusive content using QR-codes found on the Bratz Boutique™, Chic Mystique™, and Style Starz™ toylines!
